keyword: how many calories are in a california roll
title: How Many Calories Are in a California Roll?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a california roll, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for this popular sushi option.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a California Roll?
assumptions: Standard California roll (8 pieces) with imitation crab, avocado, cucumber, sushi rice, nori seaweed; no extra sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, portion size, ingredients (real vs. imitation crab), and preparation; check menus or labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard California roll (8 pieces) contains about 255 calories and 9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use brown rice instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories are in a california roll?
faqs.a: About 255 calories for a standard 8-piece California roll.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a California roll?
faqs.a: Approximately 50 g carbs, mostly from the sushi rice.

faqs.q: Is a California roll high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 600 mg sodium per roll due to rice seasoning and seaweed.

faqs.q: How many calories per piece of California roll?
faqs.a: Roughly 32 calories per piece (for an 8-piece roll).

faqs.q: Does avocado add many calories to a California roll?
faqs.a: Avocado contributes about 50 calories; removing it lowers total by ~30-40 kcal.
